Package io.rhythmknights.coreapi.component.modal.builder.modal

Class BaseModalBuilder<M extends BaseModal,B extends BaseModalBuilder<M,B>>

java.lang.Object
io.rhythmknights.coreapi.component.modal.builder.modal.BaseModalBuilder<M,B>
Type Parameters:
M - The Type of BaseModal
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseChestModalBuilder, TypedModalBuilder
public abstract class BaseModalBuilder<M extends BaseModal,B extends BaseModalBuilder<M,B>> extends Object
The base for all the modal builders this is due to some limitations where some builders will have unique features based on the modal type
